content: https://i.imgur.com/O0XwfwN.pngDonateAnyCrypto.comDonateAnyCrypto - accept donations in crypto easily!----------------------------------------------------!!! Important !!!This article is outdated. Please read the new one - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5449726.msg62128338.----------------------------------------------------AboutDonateAnyCrypto helps people to collect donations in crypto as easy as pie. You can share your donation link anywhere and start collecting donations in crypto from people all over the world.----------------------------------------------------Widget for StreamsLet's talk about our killer feature. Imagine you're a streamer. Of course, there are many ways to monetize your content, but there is nothing specific for crypto. We have a solution!You can use our donation alerts widget on your streams.https://i.imgur.com/m5ltYoJ.pngThis widget integration time is just a minute. Here is a guide: https://teletype.in/@donateanycrypto/widget_integration. You just need to grab a special link from your dashboard, insert it into OBS or another streaming program, and then place your donation link in the description of your stream or another place. Now you're ready to accept donations in crypto, which will be shown on your stream in real-time.----------------------------------------------------Do Anything You WantOf course, you don't need to be a streamer to use DonateAnyCrypto. You can share your donation link with anyone else and receive donations. There are many ways to use this service. Everything is at your disposal!----------------------------------------------------PricingDonateAnyCrypto is completely free. There is only a small commission for incoming donations, which you can see on our main page. There is no payout commission, only a network fee.----------------------------------------------------ConclusionDonateAnyCrypto is the first service for accepting donations in crypto that has a huge potential. You can use it to receive crypto donations from all over the world. Everyone is welcome on DonateAnyCrypto!----------------------------------------------------How to Get an Invite CodeAt the moment, you need an invite code to sign up on DonateAnyCrypto. To get it, please get in touch with us using this email: donateanycrypto[at]proton.me. We give it for free. You can also find some invite codes below, which we issued especially for this topic. If they don't work, please reach out to us, and we will issue a special invite code for you.Invite Codes:8ec23cf576f5c1f42fef320138e528a2be78f856Thank you, and feel free to ask any questions here or contact us on DonateAnyCrypto.Always yours,The DonateAnyCrypto TeamP.S. You can also send a donation to our service  - https://donateanycrypto.com/donate/donateanycrypto.
